Use this data source to retrieve information about a GitHub team.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as github from "@pulumi/github";

const example = pulumi.output(github.getTeam({
    slug: "example",
}, { async: true }));
```

{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}
